column5: Midtown is a great place to live. The place that I am describing is a 1 bedroom with 3 other bedrooms, it includes dining area, living room space and kitchen as well as dryer and washer. The bedroom includes cabinets, bed, walk-in closet, desk and restroom. Any person can decorate the bedroom however they want as well as restroom. This apartment includes a pool, gym and computer area, these essentials are available 24/7.
